schedule.schedule: Elemental composition of breath and its regulation for balanced health

name: Norway - Workshop with Santhi - Pranayama and Meditation, an effective way of dealing with diseases
food: Coffee and tea will be served. Lunch can be bought from Cafe next door or bring your own.
airport: Oslo, Norway (OSL / ENGM) Oslo Airport Gardermoen
description: According to traditional yoga philosophy, the root cause of most diseases is stress (Aadhi). The modern human being suffers both psychological and physiological stress and when accumulated, this can lead to “stress induced” disorders, more commonly known as lifestyle diseases. Stress alters the breathing pattern of a person, thereby affecting the energy balance of the body.
